EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App - 2015.06.09.Ema
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App webinar.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful.
Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-managing-the-chaos> for a recording of this webinar, or visit our Resource page <http://www.tricentis.com/resources> for more presentations.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Michael Facemire Principal Analyst Forrester
Wolfgang Platz Founder and Chief Product Officer​ Tricentis
